Awy boecoji , imaragodyre aiwu Are Eimejera , du ore imi jamedu , ia o tupare towadydo iiegai , akore ii : Apagudu kaba , Paulo , umode turugadu akodywo Roma kejewy César ae . Paore awy kodure akabowyge emagu akai , ewo tuginorudo . Dykodi icare , imedage , tabagudu kaba . Imeartorure boemode nono Pao o tupa akore iwiegai du reore . Cewarigudydodymode ia pobo aiare tabowu moto kae . Cemugure pobo maerewy iei Adriático cedu kajeje boecore pobe puibiji du rekodaji , boekimorema , boeco oia kejere icare nowy ika kurirewy epage ere boe pa tuburedugodyie ia moto kae dyji . Icare ere meriri barigu poboto bukigu tabo tuiordywo pobo koji ; ure pagera pudogidure ure ino pugeje . Otobiji pugeje biegatu je , boe ekana remagudure , ure pagera pudogidure pagera awubodure turegodaji pugeje . Dykodi icare epagudure tumode ika to ia toritoduji ; dykodire ere meriri motudurewy ui pobe puibijidu barigu poboto ika upo jaogwai , tuiedu rakawo ji , nonore epagare jii barogwa kodody kae . Kuri je nowy ika kurirewy epagere turegodyiagu , dykodire ere tuiagu nowy ika kurirewy je kejewy meriri motudurewy barigu poboto mare ero arodu nure , ere nowy ika biegarewy rawyje , ere tumugudo keje poboto turegodywo tada . Paulorema ure nowy ika kurirewy tadawu tugogobaigarege eimejera bie , ure tugobaigarege ewie jamedu , akore : Nowy ime emugumodykare ika kurirewy tada ma , taroiwamodykare tawo taginorudo . Dykodi icare nowy tugobaigarege ere nowy ika biegarewy iku kado , ere udo tuwudydo . Barogwa kodody tabore icare Paulore eiamedu edo tudugu tudo , ure edo iaboe rogu boe kowyje , akore ei : Merire  pagera  pudogidure ere pobe puibiji tuwygeje    tanudukai , takai ia ko dytabo . Oinore icare inogwamagudunure tai tawo iaboe rogu ko , tawo tadurudo . Ica , ia tagaorogu okwamodykare tagaora piji rugadu . Awy tagoinodytabore icare Paulore tugeragu ia amirewyji , mako pemegare Paoji eiamedu jekai , dykeje icare ure bowyje , ure togwage paru to . Awy roinodykejere icare eiamedure tudugu tudo , ere togwage paru to jamedu . Eiamedure 276 nowy ika tada . Icare ekuredure , dykeje ere nowy ika kurirewy barigodydo , tui trigo barigu poboto dytabo . Dykejere icare , meri awadure dykeje , nowy ika epage ere boe pa tuiorduwakae nowy motoji . Icare eerdure ia pobo maerewy ui turemo mototo dyji , kugarubo padure nowy pobo okwaji . Etaidure tuwo nowy ika kurirewy jodo to , turoiwamode dykeje . Icare ere nowy meriri motudurewy eceba bukigu kado kado , ere pijido toro poboto , ere ika bure kiwyje , ere ika aroia jeture ipo towu jado , icare nowy ika puredugodyre nowy kugaru okwa kae . Boekimore , nowy ika kurirewy jeture ia kugaru ao otorewyji . Nowy ika jore kugaruto , tudure to , dykeje ukare tudawyje piji , dytabore nowy ika upore tubegado , ure tuwowyje nowy pobo rakarewy koia . Icare nowy tugobaigarege etaidure tuwo nowy iera kogurewyge ewido ma , eregodykawo poboji . Mare owu eimejera iei Júlio cedu , aidure tuwo Paulo inorudo , du koiare makore ei erokawo ino . Icare akore jorduware tugurugodywowyge ei ewo tuwarigu boetoji poboto etuwo kuri toro moto kae . Iagerema etaregodyre moto kae tubadui ira keje dytabo , iage etaregodyre moto kae tubadui nowy ika kobo rogu boe ewygeje dytabo . Oinore icare eiamedu etaregodyre moto kae tuie tabo , tubemega tabo.

Paulo rakojei pobo aiare tabowu iei Malta cedykejedu . Icai cei ceginorudo dykeje , cere boe pa nowy pobo aiai tabowu moto ieie Malta , oino . Nowy moto kejewy boe eetu pemegaguragare cei , ere ia jorugu kurirewy mugudo , du oiadodare ere cemugudo , paga karega , bubutu nure , biaku nure . Icare Paulore tudugu jerigi upo kuda tuwo barigu joruto , du tonajire icare ia awagu eworirewy , rekodure joru pijidu , ure taredo ta , okwa jore tuku ierato . Nowy boe eerdure nowy awagu bararei Paulo kanajura jituji , dykeje emagore pui , egore : Boe jokodu awy imedy ure boe ewido , paga karega , ure tuginorudo pobo pegarewy piji , mare Pao aidukare jewo . Ure tugera jukodo awagu apo joruto boe puredukai pudui dytabo . Nowy boe emeardaere kana bokumodyie dykejere bimode kuri je dyji . Mare epaga raicigore bogai dykejere ere boe pa boe puredukae ji rugadu dyji . Dykodire ere tumardae kirimi , egore : Aroe Eimejeranure ema rugadu rabodu . Nowy oiei , nowy moto kejewy ia imedy iere Públio cedu o baidoge emugure . Awy imedy ure tugeragu cei tuwaito , merire pobe ma jewy metuia bokware , jetu pemegare cei . Boekimorema , nowy Publio uo kogodyre , padure tuba keje , biri uru nure , kuri kugudure jamedu . Paulo uture ae , okwamagudure Paoji paru tabo , ure tugera bu ao keje , icare ure pemegago . Awy Paulo roi oinodykejere icare , nowy pobo aiare tabowu moto kejewy kogodyrewyge eiamedu etaregodyre ae , epemegagodyre jamedu , dykodire eetu pemegaguragare cei . Icare cedui nowy piji dykeje , ere cedaidure jiboe jamedu boe maku cenai.
Ekodui Malta piji Roma kaedu . Arire pobe ma jewy metuia bokware dykeje , cere cedaredo ia Alexandria pijiwu ika kurirewyto , duwu muguradu nowy pobo aiare tabowu moto keje nowy biaku tonaji . Dioscorodoge eie mugure ika kurirewy keje . Cedaregodyre Siracusa bakurirewyto , dykeje icare cere cewuredo tada , du tadare cemugure merire pobe ma jewy metuia bokware . Du pijire cegodyre oino pobo okwaji jii cedaregodyre Régio bakurirewyto du kae . Barogwatore icare , Sul jaogwaiwu bakuru aregodyre , dytabore cegodyre . Icare merire pobe dykeje cedaregodyre Pozzuoli bakurirewyto . Nonore ceerdure ia cewiemagei , duwygere etaidure cemuguwo pudabo merimode ikera awubodure pobe taci ikera awubowuto . Dykeje cegodyre Roma bakurirewy kae . Roma kejewy pawiemage ewiedure marigudu cedaregodymode dyji . Dykodire etaregodyre cedogi jii ia bororo iei Apia cedu kae , ia boe eda iei Três Tabernas  cedu kae . Icare Paulo jordure ei dykejere ure tudugu tudo pugeje , jekarere Paoji.
Paulo roi Roma kejedu . Icare cedaregodyre Roma bakurirewyto dykeje , tugobaigarege ere Paulodo tumugudo ewai tada , ia tugobaigare jeture ji . Merire pobe ma jewy metuia bokware dykeje , Paulo makore nowy judeudoge kurirewyge ewogai , etuwo pudae . Ere tudo pui ae , dykeje icare akore ei : Imanamage , iro pegakare boei , iro pegakare paedogamage eroji , dykodi karega icare boere tugeragu ii Jerusalém tada , ere imagu Roma kejewyge ekera kai . Awygere icare tui tugogado ii dykeje , etaidure tuwo ikinorudo , eerdukare ia iro pegarewyji iwiwo kodi . Mare judeudoge ekiarire , dykodire inogwamagudure César bogai , mare itaidukare imago pegawo iwobei . Kodire imagore tawogai , imagowo tai , paga karega , Israeldoge epagare bogai boe koia boere ikera kogudo awy meriri iku tabo . Icare egore ji : Ia bapera aregodykare cewogai Judéia piji iaboe tabo , ia cewiemage etaregodykare nowy moto piji jamedu tumago pegai ai dytabo . Mare cedaidure aki rugadu amagowo cewiegai ameardae jiboeji . Paga karega , ceerduware ty jiboe reo : Boe etona etonare nowy boei boe jamedu boe keje . Icare ere ia meri remagu tumagowo pui . Dykejere makarewyge etaregodyre bogai nowy mugure tadawu baito . Meri jamedu jire emagore pui meri rutu piji jii meri butu kae . Paulo readodure ewiegai Pao o boe pemegarewyji , ure tubewudo Moisés mare profetadoge ewadaru tabo tuwo emeartorudo Jesusji . Iage emeartorure bataruji , iagerema emeartorukare . Eerdu pemegakare pu meardaere puibagi , dykodi icare eture , dykodire Paulo akore ei : Boe jokodu Aroe Pemegarewy akore taomagei profetadoge eiabiji : 26Atudo nowy boe etae , amagodo ei : Tawiaja tabore tameardumode , mare taerduwamodykare  ; taeku tabore taerdumode , mare tamodykare boe pawyje . Paga karega , awy boe ewabo rakare , ere tuwiaja mi , ere tuioku mi , tukawo tuiedorodo ma , ikawo epemegado (Is 6,s) . Dykodi icare , taerduwado : awy Pao o boe pemegarewy makudumode judeukare emawyge etai . 29(Dykejere icare judeudoge ere tudawyje nowy piji tumago rakai pui dytabo) . Paulo mugure nowy ture aruwu bai tada jorure pobe . Nonore ure tugeragu jemarure tuwogaiwyge eiamedu boei . Readodure brae ewiegai Pao o boe pemegarewyji , ure boe eerduwado Jesus jiboeji , turaga tabo , taidytabo rugadu , iaboe iaboe emagokare ji rokawo ino.








ROMANOS

PAULO O BAPERA ATUGO ROMA        KEJEWUGE EWOGAIDU

Boe eimadu . Imi , Paulo , imode awy bapera atugodo . Jesus Cristo burejoianure imi , Pao ure apostolodo imi , ure tugeragu ii iwo bakaru pemegarewy kogado du bogai . Marigudu Pao makore to profetadoge eiabiji awy bakaru pemegarewy umode tudowyje dyji , duwygere awy inodu bu bapera pemegarewy keje . Kejere boe emagore Pao Onaregedu Pagimejera Jesus Cristo jiboeji , duwu brae eimejera Davi otojiwunure ema , imedyi pudumi du reore . Aroe Pemegarewyre boe edo boe pa Aroe Eimejera Onaregeduie Jesus Cristoce dyji , jewodui birewyge epiji du koia . Pagimejera Jesus Cristo , koiare ure apostolodo imi , imaragodywo tumaragodaeji , iwo awy moto kejewy boe erego emeartoruwo ji , ewiapagawo ji .      Awyge etadare tamedure jamedu , Roma kejewyge , Jesus Cristo makore tawogai jamedu . Taiamedu boe , Roma kejewyge , Pao meardu kurire tai , togewo tagi du bogai . Pao Aroe Eimejera , Pagimejera Jesus Cristo o boe pemegarewy boe butugurewy jetuwo tagabo . Iegare kuricigore Aroe Eimejeraji , Jesus Cristo tada , taigoia , mare paga karega , moto kejewyge eiamedu boe eegarenure tameartoraeji.
Paulo aidure tudywo Roma bakurirewy kaedu . Pao Aroe Eimejera , imaragodyre aiwu iwabo jamedytabo Tonaregedu o bakaru pemegarewy keje , jorduware imagoi pudui tabaru tabo dyji . Inogwamagudure ty tu ty ji tuwo itudo tawogai , taidumode dykeje . Itogea kuricigore iordywo tai , iwo ia baru tadawu boe pemegarewy maku tagai , tameardu awadywo tai du bogai . Mare pawo pu meardu awadydo puibagi , pameartorae mitodu jitu koia . Iwiemage , itaidure taerduwawo itaidu rakare iordywo tai du bogai dyji , itaidure imaragody pemegawo tagabo , imaragody magai ia ao pegokarewyge ekao du reore , mare jii oino iroiwakare ituwo tawogai roga . Imaragodyre boe eiamedu boe etai : Grécia kejewyge etai , Grécia kejewukare emawyge etai , jorduwarewyge etai , jorduwakarewyge etai jamedu . Dykodire ire irugadu iwo bakaru pemegarewy kogado Roma kejewyge tawiegai jamedu.
Boe emeartorae . Ipogurumodykare inagoi bakaru pemegarewy jituji . Paga karega , ro rakaguragarewynure ema tuwo meartorurewyge eiamedu einorudo , Judéia kejewyge boetoji , rekodaji Judéia kejewukare emawyge . Mare paga karega , kejere Pao o boe jetororewy ure towadydo taregodyi boe emeartorae piji , tui boe erego boe emeartorae kae , padumagai bapera pemegarewy keje du reore : Pemegarewy imedy jemode tumeartorae kodi (Hab 2,4).
Meartoru bokwarewyge ero pegarewy . Boe jokodu , Pao kodu kagirire ure boe rakarewy biado turo pegarewy koiawu imei . Paga karega , ure boe eerdumode puduiboe awadydo eegai . Awy moto towyjedure du rekodaji , boe eerdukare jiwu Pao jiboe : ro raka , Aroe Eimejerai pudumidu , boe eerduware ji ure towyjeboe koia . Dykodire boe emodykare tuiorduwa bokwa bokwado . Boe eerdui Pao jitu tabo , ekare akaru kurido , ekare tukutaido ji , dure karega , emeardae pegare , ewabo mugure boeco tada . Egore tuiorduwa rakaguragae , mare etaora bai baire . Ewiapagakare Aroe Eimejera remawuji , mare ewiapagare aroe eimejerakare emawygei , ime ereorewygei , barege ereorewygei , kiege barege ereorewygei . Dykodire Paore emagu nowy ewabo aidure jiboe kai , dykodire ere tugody pegado . Ere Pao bataru jetorogodyrewy maku tuwadararodae jipagi , ere tubojodo Paore towuji boeji , du jire ewiapagare , ekare tubujodo Pao remawuji , ewiapagakare ji . Duwu jire boe eegaremode jii je . Oino gody . Dykodire Paore emagu poguru bokwareboe kai : Areme ere tumagu turowo nono eromodykare jiboe kai . Ime ero pegare pui jamedu , tui toreduje pijido dytabo , ere tumagu puai , dykodire ere tugody pegado turo pegarewy morice . Etaidukare tuiorduwawo Paoji , dykodire ure emagu tumeardae pegarewy kai , turomodykare jiboeji . Enogorobadure boe pegarewy awadytabo , boe ero pegajagurewy awadytabo , boe etaidui pu oroe jitu tabo , boe erorerae pegarewy tabo , boe eimaredyi pui dytabo , boei pu bito dytabo , boe erugodyi pui dytabo , boe ewadarodae tabo , boe emeardae pegarewy tabo , etonare Pao Aroe Eimejeraji . Emago pegare pui , enogirure pui , ekodu kagirire pui , ere tojarodo pudui , ero pegarewy awadure , ewiapagakare tuomagei . Etaora bai baire , ewadaru riki bokwa , enogudu bokware tumedage ebo . Ero kigodyre awy turoino jiboeji icare eiore rore oinowygei jamedu , eerduware Pao akoe inodu bitodumode , kodi karega.

Paoi tugogado boeidu . Imedyia , are akogado amedagei ? Nowy inodytabo aro peganure rugadu . Are akogado amedagei mare arore nono ero reore , dytabo are boe pegado ai akaobiji . Paerduware Pao jetorogodyi tui tugogado nowy rore oinowyge ei dyji . Mare aki are akogado amedagei , aroi nono ero reore , ameardaekana amode akinorudo Pao umode tugogado ai dypiji ? Amodukana Pao pemegaguragai paidu redugodydo ? Aerduwakare Pao makoi awagoidu tubemegaguraga tabo awo atugu ato , apemegawo du bogai ? Mare awabo rakaguragare , akaidukare ameartoruwo Pao bataruji , dykodire anure Pao korigodymode aidu itodydo , umode tugogado boei dykejewy meri kae . Umode paro morido pagai paro rekodaji . Umode jere jii jeboe maku ure tubewudo pudui tuwo turo pemegadowyge etai , jemarure tuiegare pemegawo , tuwo tugurido , tuwi bokwawo du bogaiwyge etai . Mare aidure ty puduiwyge , ure boe rikirewy pijido tugodywo boe jokodukarewy rekodajiwyge , Pao korigodymode ei , umode etogorido . Ro pegarewyge eiamedu boe , boe korimode ei , eno maidodumode pudabo : Judéia kejewyge ekodumode boetoji , Judéia kejewukare emawyge ekodumode rekodaji nowy inoduto . Mare Pao umode boe pemegarewy , boe butugurewy maku ro pemegarewyge etai : Judéia kejewyge etai boetoji , eregodaji Judéia kejewukare emawyge etai . Paga karega , Pao aiwore bo eiamedu boei pureore . Judeukare emawyge enokare Moisés ui boe eroiagudu : ero pegare dykeje , ere tuwarigu boe pegarewyto awy boe eroiagudu bokwa tabo . Cewu ore Moisés ui boe eroiaguduwyge eiamedu boe ero pegare dykeje , awy boe eroiagudu umode tugogado ei . Paga karega , meardure boe eroiagudu jiwyge epemegakare , mare ty rore nono boe eroiagudu reorewyge epemegare Pao jekai . Judeukare emawyge enokare Moisés boe eroiagudu rema , mare erore tumeardae reore boe eroiagudu rekodaji , enokare nowy inoduce , kodi karega . Kode emeardae ure turugadu etai boe eroiagudu reore . Nowy turoino dytabo , ere oinodu awadydo boe eroiagudu metui tuwabo tada dyji . Nowy ewabo tadaboe ure edo boe pa awy inodu boe jokoduie . Mare paga karega , ia dykeje emeardaere turo pegaie ure , ia dykeje emeardaere turo pemegaie ure dyji . Nowy inodu awadumode Pao umode tugogado ime ero biadurewy jiwu meriji Jesus Cristo koia , ire kogadowu bakaru pemegarewy rekodaji . Aki akagore judeuie ure aki , are aiodo boe eroiagudykeje , aegarere ako Aroe Eimejeraji . Aerduware Pao aidure jiboeji , boe eroiagudu ure aerduwado boe pemegarewy ema remawuji . Akire ameardaere akodui joku bokwarewyge etododai dyji , ameardaere akie urugureboere aki boeco tadawyge etaiduji , ocarokare puduiwyge ekodu pemegado dyji , aerduwa birigodyi boe jetorogodyrewy padui boe eroiagudykeje dyji . Akire are amedage eerduwado , kodiba akare aerduwado ? Akagore boe eiwogu kaiagu , kodiba akiwogure ? Akagore boe eerebari kaiagu , kodiba aerebarire ? Akodu kagirire aroe eimejerakare emawygei , mare kodiba akiwogure ewai tada boeji ? Akojarore ai boe eroiaguduji , mare Pao poguraenure aki akodui boe eroiagudu peragajeje dytabo . Mare paga karega , bapera atugo akore : Judeukare emawyge emago pegare Pao ieji taigoia (Is 52,5) . Aromode nono boe eroiagudu rekodaji ma , judeudoge eno kruca umode turugadu ai , mare ameartorumodykare ji ma , amode nono kruca padukare kejewyge ereore . Kruca padukare kejewyge eromode nono boe eroiagudu reore ma , Pao biapagamode ei biapaga magai kruca padure kejewyge ei du reore . Dykodi icare , judeukare emawu turoi nono boe eroiagudu reore umode tugogado ai , are boe eroiagudykejeboe kado aerdui boe eroiaguduji , kruca padui awygeje dykodi karega . Judeu ema remawu karega ure ema , nowy ure oino boe eegai ty je , kruca padure ty keje karega jamedu . Paci oino , kruca padure uwabo kejewy judeu remawu rema , Aroe Pemegarewy koia , mare bapera atugo koia karega . Boe ewadaru jerebarimodykare apo , mare ty Pao Aroe Eimejera jerebarimode apo.

Inoba judeudoge ekodure iage ekori . Inoba judeudoge ekodure iage ekori ? Inoba kruca padure kejewyge ekodure kruca padukare kejewyge ekori ? U ! Inodu kuricigo , makaguragare . Boetoji , ica , Pao ure tumeartorudo to bakaru pemegarewy tabo etai . Kode , ia emage emeartorukare ma , kode , nowy emeartorukaredy umode Pao meardu kurii boeidu kado ? Boro ! Ukare ino rugadu ! Boe eiamedu boe ewadararodure , mare Pao makore boe rikirewyji ty rugadu . Ure nono bapera atugo reore : Boemode boe pa aedorogodyie ure dyji awadaru keje , ai akogado boei dykeje (Sl 50,6) . Paro pegarewy umode Pao jetorogodyidu awadydo ma , inoba pagagomode ? Pagagomode ro pegaie ure tugorigodyi pai dyji ? 6(Imagonure ime emagore jiboe reore) . Boro ! Ukare ino ! Umode ino ma , inoba umode tugogado awy moto kejeboeji ? Iwadararodae umode Pao jetororeboe urugu awadydo ma , kodiba icare umode tugogado ro pegareboeie ure imi dyji ? Umode ino ma , kodiba pagagomodykare oino : Paro pegawo , boe pegarewy aregodywo boe pegarewy piji  ? (Boe jokodu iaboe emeardae pegare ii tagoi iie iiodo nowy inodykeje dyji . Mare boe pegamode nowy boe egoi oinodu morice).
 	Boe eiamedu boe ero pegare . Kode , inoba pagago mode ? Judeudoge cegi cebemega kodumodukana judeukare emawyge epemega kori ? Boro ! Cere , judeudoge eiamedu boe , judeukare emawyge eiamedu boe eedui boe pegarewy kudadu awadydo . Nono bapera atugo reore : Ia ro pemegareboe bokwa . Ia jorduwareboe bokwa . Ia jemarure Pao bogai boe bokwa . Boe eiamedu boe ere tuiaedo awara jetororewy piji . Boe eiamedu boe ere tuwogwado . Ia ro pemegareboe bokwa , boe bokwa rugadu . Eruwo ure nono boe eiao jadody reore . Boe ewadararodaere tudawyje eiabiji , awague etogori reoreboe ure tuwiado enogwa tada  (Sl 5 , 10 ; Sl 89,4) . 14Eia okorobadure tuwadaru pegarewy tabo , jirireboe tabo . Ewure kiarikare , eregody rakare tuwo boe eku redo . Boe ecebae , ure boe epegadoboe , jeture ekoda rea keje . Eerduwakare boe butugurewy kaewu awaraji (Is 59,7) Eerduwakare tubagudui Paoce dyji (Sl 32,5) . Aró , kode , paerduware padure boe eroiagudykejeboe jamedu boeie makore mugure boe eroiagudu kudawyge ewiegai dyji . Nowy inodytabowo boe eiamedu boe enogwa jetukawo pugeje , jamedu awy moto kejewy boewo boe pa turo pegarewyji Pao jekai . Paga karega , iaboe iaboe umodykare tubemegado boe eroiagudu koia . Mare boe eroiagudu ure boe edo boe pawyje boe ero pegarewyji ty je.
Boe ere tubemegado tumeartorui Jesus Cristo jitu koia . Mare oino , boe eroiagudu , mare profetadoge emagore jiwu Pao o jetororeboe , ure towadydo boe eroiagudu bokwa tabo . Pao o jetororeboe makudure boe emeartorui Jesus Cristo jitu koia , meartorure jiwyge eiamedu boe etai , boe epadukare pumekeje kodi . Mare paga karega , eiamedu boe ero pegare , ere tuiaedo Pao urugu piji . Epemegagodyre mori bokwa tabo , Pao o boe pemegarewy koia ; Jesus Cristo koiare ure einorudo . Pao aidure Cristo uwo tuiwodo du koiawo boe ero pegarewy okwadody makudywo boe etai , boe emeartorui Jesus Cristo jitu koia . Du tabore ure boe eerdydo tuiedororeboeji , tuwudugugodyi mariguduwyge ero pegarewyji . Awy kodiwu keje ure boe eerdydo tuiedororeboeji , tui meartorure Cristo jiwyge eedorodo dytabo . Dykodire pagojaromode du koiaboe bokwa . Kodiba ? Paroi nono boe eroiagudu reore dykodi kana ? Boro ! Pameartorure Cristo jitu kodi . Mare paga karega , cemeardaere boe epemegagodyie tumeartoru koia , mare turoi nono boe eroiagudu reore du koia karega . Paokana umode ty judeudoge eno Aroe Eimejera ? Judeukare emawyge eno Aroe Eimejera karega una ? U ! Ema rugadu . Paore judeukare emawyge eno Aroe Eimejera jamedu . Pao Aroe Eimejera ure mito ty je . Emare umode judeudoge , judeukare emawyge eedorodo emeartoru koia . Awy inodytabo , pakana ure boe eroiagudu perodydo pudui boe emeartorae koia ? Boro ! Ukare ino ! Paci oino , panure boe eroiagudu rakado.

Abraão ure tubemegado tumeartorae koia . Inoba pagagomode makudure kodure pagododaiwu Abraão aiboeji ? Inoba boere ji ? Abraãmode tuiedorodo turo koia ma , ocaromode pudui rugadu , mare Pao jekai karega . Bapera atugo pemegarewy akore oino : Abraão meartorure Paoji , dykodire Pao biapagare nowy inoduji tuwo jetorogodydo (Gen 15,6) . Mare maragodyrewy maragodae morire , mori makudu karega ure boe enogudu koia , mare maragodae koia . Mare cewy ia ro bokwarewy meartorure ure ro pegarewy jetorodowu Pao jiwu , nowy meartoru koiare ure jetorodo , Pao okudu koia . Awy inodu jire Davi makore , tagoi : Eiwo aidugirimode Pao umode eedorodo taiwo kai ero jitu tabo . Jiwo aidugirirewyge ero pegarewy okwadodure , biadodure . Jiwo aidugirirewy imedy Pao biapagakare ro pegarewyji ! (Sl 31,s) . Davi makoi awy inodu jitu tabo , ty kruca padure kejewyge eiwo aidugirimode ? Boro ! Kruca padukare kejewyge eiwo aidugirimode jamedu . Mare paga karega , pamagore : Abraão meartorure , kodire Paore pemegado . Inoba boeredykejeba awy inodure tudowyje ? Kruca padui Abraão kejedu otodai kana ? Iarema rekodaji kana ? Kruca padure kejedu rekodaji karega , mare kruca padure kejedu otodai . Kruca padure keje ia boiwu keje . Nowy kruca padui kejedu koiare boe edo boe pa pao Abraão jetorogodyre dyji , meartoru koia , nowy kruca padumode kejedu otodai . Nowy inodu koia Abraão orenure meartorurewyge eiamedu boece , duwygere Pao aidure ei , kruca padukai ewygeje dytabo . Abraão orenure kruca padure kejewyge eiamedu boece jamedu , kruca padui ewygeje dykodi karega , mare ekodure Abraão ro rekodaji kodi . Pao makore Abraãoji , rekodajiwygei jamedu , enomodyie awy motoce dyji . Pao makore awy inoduji , mare Abraão rore nono boe eroiagudu reore dykodi karega , mare ure jetorodo meartoru koia dykodi . Mare Pao umode makuboe , kodure boe eroiagudu rekodajiwyge enomode ema , boe karega umode boe emeartoraece , icare Pao akore tumode maku boe etaiboe kodumodykare pudui . Mare boe eroiagudu ure boe ekorigodae arego . Mare boe eroiagudu bokwa keje , boe ero pegarewy bokwamode jamedu . Nowy inodu koia , Pao akore tumodyie makuboe aregodymode boe emeartorae koia , duma , Pao akore tumodyie makuboe makudu pagawo Abraão ore eiamedu boe etai . Pao akore tumodyie makuboere , rore nono boe eroiagudu reorewyge etai ty je karega , mare meartorure nono Abraão meartoru reorewyge etai jamedu , paiamedu boe Paonure ema kodi . Oinore bapera atugo pemegarewy akore : Ire makaguragarewy moto kejewyge etuodo aki . (Gen 17,69) . Oinore Abraão meartorure jiwu Aroe Eimejera akore . Ure birewyge ewodydowu Aroe Eimejera , ure jekareboe eedowu Aroe Eimejera . Upagamode bogaiboe bokware boe eegai , dytabore upagare , meartorure makarewy moto kejewyge etuomode pudumi dyji , nowy bapera atugo pemegarewy ako reore : 
Oinore aregodajiwyge emagaguragare (Gen 15,59) . O joru puredugodynure 100 kae , jordure tageduie ure dyji , jorduware toreduje Sara akeduie ure jamedu dyji , mare du inodytabo meartoru akedu kare . Ukare Pao bataru perodydo pudui , mare ure turo rakado tumeartoru tabo , tui Pao jekaredo dytabo . Jorduwa birigodyre Pao roiwai turowo nono tagoi turomode jitu reore . Du inodu koiare Pao ure pemegado . Awy bapera atugo akoi Paore pemegado . Abraãoji ty je karega akoino . Paire akoino jamedu . Paga karega , pameartorure ure Pagimejera Jesus Cristo jewodydo birewyge epijiwuji , dykodire umode paedorogodydo , umode pabemegado jamedu . Pagimejera Jesus Cristo bitodure paro pegarewy koia , jewodure birewyge epiji tuwo pabemegado du bogai.

Boei tubemegado Jesus Cristo ro koia . Icare paedorogodydodyre pameartoru koia , du koiare pabemegare Paoji , pagimejera Jesus Cristo koia . Koiare ure pagarego Pao o boe pemegarewy kae , pameartorui jitudu koia . Icare padumode pabewu tabo awy Pao o boe pemegarewy tabo , icare paegarere pabaga tabo paedywo Pao urugu tada du bogai . Mare paegarere pagogodae keje jamedu , paga karega , paerduware pagogodae koiaie ure pabewudo pai paro pemegarewyji . Awy pai pabewudo paro pemegarewy jitudu ure Pao aidydo pai ; awy Pao aidui paidu koiare ure pado pabagado . Awy pai pabagadody umodykare paekuri pagado , paga karega , Paore tumeardu kurii paidu redo pawabo tada , ture maku pagaiwu Aroe Pemegarewy koia . Ia meri keje , paro pega keje , Cristo bitodure ro pegarewyge pagai , boe aregodyre pudae dykeje . Ica , boe ewimodykare ro pegarewy ai . Ia boe pemegareboe etaire boe emode tuiwodo rakudu . Mare Paore tumeardu kuricigoi paidu awadydo , paro pega kimo dytabo . Cristoi tuiwodo pagai du koia . Mare oinore icare paedorogodyre ku koia , u kodi icare Cristo mitodu koiare umode paginorudo Pao korigodyi pai dypiji . Paga karega , pagonai pudui dykeje , Paore pabemegado pudui Tonaregedu bi koia ma , oino icare , pabemegai pudui dykeje , umode paginorudo Tonaregedu jewodu koia . Paegarewo Paoji , Pagimejera Jesus Cristo koia , koiare ure pabemegado Paoji.
Adão mare Jesus Cristo . Ia imedy ui mito ty je du koiare ure boe ero pegarewydo turemo awy mototo ; boe ero pegarewy ure boe ewidody arego . Du inodu koiare boe ewidody ure taodo boe eiamedu boe eiogi , boe eiamedu boe ero pegare kodi . Boe eroiagudu makudumode boe etai dyotodai , boe ero pegarewy jeture awy moto keje marigudu . Mare cewy boe ero pegarewy ukare boe epegado , boe eroiagudu bokwa keje . Mare Adão piji jii Moisés ae boe eiamedu boe ewire ; ro pegakare Adão ro pegamagai tui tudugu Pao bataru kudadu reorewyge ewire jamedu . Adão jebatodure cewy aregodymodewuji . Mare epadure pumekeje , paga karega , Pao o boe pemegarewy makudui boe etaidu jebatodukare Adao ro pegarewyji kodi : Makarewyge ewire ia imedyi mito ty je du ro pegarewy koia rugadu . Mare Pao o boe pemegarewy kodu remawunure nowy ro pegarewy kori . Ure boe einorudody makudu pagado boe eiamedu boe etai , ia Imedyi mito ty je du meardu kuricigoi boei du koia , dure Jesus Cristo rema . Paore makuboe rore tuginoi , cewy imedy ui mito ty jedu ro pegarewy rore tuginoi jamedu (epadure pumekeje) : Ia boe ero pegarewy ui mito ty je du koiare ure boe ewarigu boe pegarewyto , mare Pao o boe pemegarewy ure makarewy boe ero pegarewy okwado . Ia imedyi mito ty je du ro pegarewy koiare ure boe ewidodydo tubodo boe ebo , mare Jesus Cristo ui mito ty je du ro pemegarewy kodu remawure nowy ro pegarewy kori , dykodire boe pemegarewy makudu awadure etaiwyge , Paore jetorogodydowyge eemode rugadu Jesus Cristo mito ty je du koia . Dykodire , boemagai ia boe ero pegarewy ure boe eiamedu boe ewarigu boe pegarewyto , du reorere ia boe ero pemegarewy ure boe eiamedu boe einorudo , ure boe edo tuguo pugeje . Jamedu , boemagai boe eiamedu boe ere turo pegado ia imedy ui mito ty je du meartorukai Pao bataru jitu koia , du reorere boe eiamedu boe eedorogodymode ia Imedy ui mito ty je du meartorui Pao bataru jitu koia . Boe eroiagudu aregodyre tuwo boe ero pegarewy ko tao kae . Mare boe ero pegarewy kuricigorewo kejere , Pao o boe pemegarewy kodure tao kae kori . Oino , boemagai boe ero pegarewy jeture boei tui boe ewogwado dytabo , du reorere Pao o boe pemegarewy jeture boei tui boe eedorodo dytabo , ure parego boe ewimodykare wo kae , Pagimejera Jesus Cristo koia.

Boe etao pegododu . Kode , inoba pagagomode ? Paro pegamodukana kimo Pao o boe pemegarewy kodywo tao kae ? Boro ! Ukare ino ! Pawire marigudu paro pegarewy kai , dykodire padumodykare keje pugeje . Boe jokodure taerduware pagaimodure Cristo apowyge eiamedu boe , bi tadaie pagaimodure . Awy pagaimodure du koia , padugudodure Cristo apo tuwi tada , duma , boemagai Cristo jewodure birewyge epiji Pao ro rakarewy koia , du reorere pagi jamedu paewodu maidumode jamedu . Pagodyre apo bi reore , icare pagodymode apo jewodu reore jamedu . Paerduware awy pawodui paro pegarewy tabodu bitodure Cristo apo i padui pugajejedykeje , inodu akedywo du bogai , paedukawo boe pegarewy iera keje pugeje . Paga karega , birewyge eedumodykare boe ero pegarewy ro kuda pugeje . Pawire Cristo apo ma , pamearutorure paedumode apo jamedu dyji . Paerduware Cristo jewoduie birewyge epiji dyji , bimodukae pugeje dyji . Awy ure boe ewogwa ewogwadoboe ro rakakare ji pugeje kodi . Cristo bire boe ero pegarewy koia mito ty je , awy inodu ure turugadu , mare oino jere jii je Pao koia . Du reorere tagi jamedu tameardaedo tawie ure taro pegarewy ai , mare taeie ure Pao ai Cristo tabo dyji . Dykodi icare tagaba boe ero pegarewy udo tuwure jodo tawygeje , tagaba boe ero pegarewy udo tarego tameardae pegarewy rekodaji . Tagaba ia taredy maku boe ero pegarewy ai ; tamagu Pao ai boemagai boere tarego tawi piji taewo du kae du reore . Taiamedu boe maku Pao ai , tabemegawo du bogai . Boe ero pegarewy umodykare tuwure jodo tawygeje , mare paga karega , taragojekare boe eroiagudu kuda pugeje , mare taragojere Pao o boe pemegarewy tada.
Boei tuginorudo turo pegarewy ro raka pijidu . Kode , paro pegamodukana paedukai boe eroiagudu kuda , mare Pao o boe pemegarewy tada dykodi kana ? Boro ! Ukare ino ! Taerduware tai tamagu ia boe etai etugaregewo tagidykeje , boe jokodu etugarere tagi rugadu dyji . Dykodire taroiwamode tawo tamagu boe pegarewy kai , iarema Pao ai taedorogodywo . Mare ceegarere Paoji taigoia : boe ero pegarewy utugaregere tagi marigudu , mare oino tameartorure tawabo jamedytabo makudure tagaiwu Pao bataruji , du koiare ceegarere Paoji . Taginorudodure boe pegarewy piji , icare Pao utugaregere tagi tarowo nono Pao aidu reore . Imago awadumode tai taerduwa jokodukare kodi , tawo boe pa awy inoduji : tamagai marigudu tare tamagu pegareboe kai , tagody pega jokodywo du bogai , du reorere oino tare tamagu Pao ai taedywo boe pemegarewy tada . Boe ero pegarewy utugaregei tagi dykeje , tarokare nono Pao aidu reore . Mare kaboba makudure tagai nowy taro pegarewy ui tabogurudody morice ? Tawimodedure morimode ema . Mare oino taginorudodure boe ero pegarewy piji ; Pao utugaregenure tagi dykodire taedorogodydodyre , taemode jii je . Mare paga karega , boe ero pegarewy morire boe ewi rema . Mare Paore maku pagaiboere jere jii jeboe rema , Pagimejera Jesus Cristo koia.

Meartorurewy ui tuginorudo boe eroiagudypijidu . Iwiemage , (imagonure jorduware boe eroiagudu jiwyge tai) , taerduwakare boe emugumodyie boe eroiagudu kuda ty turagojei awy moto keje du tonaji ? Pawo ia aredy mugui toredu apodu jebato awy inagoino jiboeji ka : Ia aredy ukogerewydo mugure toredu apo ty rakoje otoi , boe eroiagudu rekodaji ; mare bimode dykeje , inorudodure awy boe eroiagudypiji . Mare mugumode ia imedy apo toredu rakojei kimo dykeje , iedodumode aredy ro pegarewydo , oino . Mare oredu bimode piji ma , inorudodure awy boe eroiagudypiji , ro pegamodykare tui tugogedo ia imedy apo pugeje dytabo . Oinore boere tai jamedu , iwiemage : Jesus Cristo padui i padui pugajejedykeje du koiare tawire boe eroiagudumodedypiji , tamagudywo iaboe etai ; oinore icare Cristo jewodure birewyge epijiwu ogenure tagi , duma taro pemegawo Pao ai . Pamugure pagody keje dykeje , boe eroiagudu koiare ure paro pegarewy jewodydo padoda , nowy inodu koia ure pawogwado . Mare oino paginorudodure nowy pagogudodure tabowu boe eroiagudypiji , dykodire paronure Pao aidu reore , mare bapera mariguduwu aidu reore karega . Ica , inoba pagagomode ? Pagagokana umode boe pegarewyie ure boe eroiaguduce ? Boro ! Ukare ino ! Mare boe eroiagudu koiare ure ido boe pa boe ero pegarewyji . Boe eroiagudu akomodykare  : Akagemokaba boe pegarewyji oino dykeje , iorduwamodykare kaboba boe etogeai boe pegarewy jidu rema . Mare boe pegarewy koiare ure boe eroiagudu udo itogeado boe pegarewyji . Mare boe eroiagudu bokwa tabo , boe pegarewy ure nono bireboe reore . Mare paga karega , ia boe keje iorduwakare boe eroiaguduji , du tonajire iere . Mare boe eroiagudu aregody keje , boe ero pegarewy jewodure . Imirema iwogware . Dykodire boe eroiagudu , umode iedowu , ure irego iwi kae . Paga karega , boe ero pegarewy ure iekuri pagado , ure irego iwi kae boe eroiagudu koia . Mare boe eroiagudu pemegare , jetorore . Kode , pemegareboe ure bireboe arego inai ? Boro ! Ukare ino ! Mare boe ero pegarewy , tuwo pudumi rugadu , ure bireboe arego inai pemegareboe tabo , duma boe ero pegarewy kodywo tao kae boe eroiagudu koia.
Boe eroiagudu roiwakai boe ero pegarewy jidu . Paerduware aroereboeie boe eroiaguduce , imirema kodureboenure imi , ire imagu pegareboe kai . Iorduwakare irore jiboeji ; paga karega , irokare itaidure jiboeji , irore itaidukare jiboeji . Mare irore itaidukare jiboeji ma , iorduware boe eroiagudu pemegaie . Dykodire irokare itaobiji mare iro pegarewy mugure itadawu koiare ure irodino . Iorduware itadaie , ikodu tadaie boe pemegarewy mugukare , paga karega , itaidure boe pemegarewyji mare iroiwakare irowo ji . Irokare itaidure jiwu boe pemegarewyji , mare irore itaidukare jiwu boe pegarewyji . Kode , irore itaidukare jiboeji ma , itaobiji karega iroino , mare mugure itadawu boe pegarewy ure irodino . Kode , iordure ia boe ui iroiagudody itada : itaidui irowo boe pemegarewyji du je , boe pegarewy jepadure inai . Itaroe tada iegarere Pao o boe eroiaguduji . Mare ikodu tada imeardure ia boe eroiaguduji du onare Pao o boe eroiaguduji , ure iwarigu boe ero pegarewy ui boe eroiaguduto , dure mugure ikodu tada . Jiwo aidugirikarewy imedynure imi ! Ioguduba umode ikinorudo awy ure irego iwi kaewu ikodypiji ? Paegarewo Paoji , Pagimejera Jesus Cristo koia . Kode itaroe tada imeartorure Pao o boe eroiaguduji , mare ikodu tada imugure boe ero pegarewy ui boe eroiagudu kuda.

Boe eei Aroe Pemegarewy koiadu . Dykodi icare , rakojere Jesus Cristo tadawyge ewarigudumodykare boe pegarewyto pugeje . Paga karega , ure paedowu Aroe o boe eroiagudu ure ikinorudo , Cristo tada , boe ero pegarewy o boe eroiagudypiji , boe ewi piji . Moisés o boe eroiagudu ure turoiwakare tuwo towyjeboe , pagody pawiri kugudykodi , ure tugogado boe ero pegarewyji boe ekodykeje . Paga karega , Paore Tonaregedu rojai , duwu ure tudo nono pareore , mugure pagody ro rakarewy tada , tuwo paro pegarewy okwado . Pao ure awy inodu towyje pameartoruwo boe eroiaguduji , mare paroi nono Aroe Pemegarewy aidu reore , mare pagody aidu reore karega . Rore nono boe ekodu aidu reorewyge ekodure boe ekodu ro rekodaji . Rore nono Aroe Pemegarewy aidu reorewyge ekodure Aroe Pemegarewy rekodaji . Pagody aidure jiboere pawi rema , mare Aroe Pemegarewy aidure jiboe paewodu rema , boe butugurewy rema . Boe ekodu aidure jiboe onare Paoji , boe ekodu kodukare Pao aidu rekodaji , kodumodykare rekodaji rugadu . Rore nono boe ekodu aidu reorewyge emodykare Pao aidydo . Tagirema , tagodykare boe ekodu aidu rekodaji , mare tagodyre Aroe Pemegarewy aidu rekodaji , Pao o Aroe Pemegarewy mugui tadoda dykeje . Mare Cristo o Aroe mugumodykare iaboe ebo ma , Cristo oge karega ure emage . Kode Cristo mugure tadoda ma , tagody bire boe ero pegarewy koia mare Aroe Pemegarewy koiare ure taedo , taedorogodydodyre kodi . Ure Jesus jewodydo birewyge epijiwu o Aroe Pemegarewy mugure tagabo ma , ure Jesus Cristo jewodydo birewyge epijiwu umode taredy jedo jamedu , nowy Aroe Pemegarewy mugure tagabo du koia.
Ure tuiedorodowu imedy , Pao o boe pemegarewy mugure apo . Kodi icare , iwiemage , paromodykare nono pagody aidu reore . Taromode nono tagody aidu reore ma , tawimode . Mare Aroe Pemegarewy ro raka koiamode tamode tagody ro bito ma , taemode . Paga karega , kodure Pao o Aroe Pemegarewy rekodajiwyge , Pao orenure emage . Boe ekare tudugaredo tagi tabagudywo , mare Paore toredo tagi , du koiare tagagore : Ioga oino ji . Aroe Pemegarewy ure pado boe pa Pao oreie ure pagi dyji . Orenure pagi dykeje jeonare oroe jiwygere pagi jamedu . Jeonare Pao oroe jiwygere pagi Cristo apo . Mare paga karega , boe ekorire pai Cristo apo ma , pamuguwo Cristo urugu tada du bogai jamedu . Imeardaere awy boe ekorire pai awy moto kejewy , puredukare boe eegareae , boe etaidae awadodumode pagaiwu jituji . Dykodire awy moto kejewy boe eiamedu boe upagare ake tabo Pao ore emode towadydo du bogai . Paga karega , awy todureboe jamedu boe mugure boe pegarewy kuda , mare taobiji karega , mare ure tumorido jiboe koia . Pabagare awy boe eiamedu boe inorudodumode awy boe pegarewy piji , jetumode Pao ore eegarae , etaidae tada du bogai dykodi . Paga karega , paerduware awy boe jamedu boe oragudure ia aredy akomagai tuguri jirigody kori koia du reore . Mare awy moto kejeboe mito ty je karega , mare pagi jamedu , Aroe Pemegarewy makudure aiwygere pagi jamedu . Mare pagoragudure kimo , pabaga kimoi Pao umode toredo pagi du bogai , umode paginorudo taci je du bogai . Pabaga kimoi du koiare paginorudodure . Aró , kode , boe eerdui tubagare bogaiboe jitu keje ma , boe epagare bogaiboe karega ure ema pugeje . Boe eerdui , boe epagamodykare bogai pugeje . Pabagamode paerdukare jiboe bogai ma , pawudugu tabo pabagamode bogai . Jamedu , Pao o Aroe Pemegarewy aregodymode tuwo tugera braredo paro rakakaji . Paerduwakare kaba bogaiba pagogwamagudumode Paoji , mare Aroe Pemegarewy okwamagudumode ji , toragudu tuginoiwu tabo . Pao jorduware ime ewabo tadaboeji , jorduware Aroe aidure jiboeji , paga karega , Aroe okwamagudure Pao ore eparu tabo , Pao aidu reore . Paerduware boe eiamedu boeie turo remagu tuwo tugerabraredo meardu kurire Pao jiwygei , Pao makore bogaiwyge ei , taidu rekodaji . Paga karega , ure tugeragu pudae tuiorduware jiwygei , emagewo nono Tonaregedu reore , awy Tonaregedu uwo nono ia boetojiwu metui makaguragarewy tuwiemage etadadu reore . Ure tugeragu pudaiwyge , makore ewogai jamedu , ure eedorodo , icare ure eedorodowyge umode emedydo turugu tada jamedu . Du inodykodire , inoba pagagomode ? Pao rakojemode pagabo ma , ioguduba umode tumorido pai ? Iera iworikare Tonaregedu apo pudai , mare ure maku paiamedu pagai . Ure Tonaregedu maku pagai , kode , umodykare boe jamedu boe maku pagai jamedu mori bokwa tabo ? Ioguduba umode boe pegado Pao ure tugeragu pudaiwyge ei ? Pao mitodure ure eedorodo . Ioguduba umode boe pegado ei ? Jesus Cristo bire pagaidu , jewodure birewyge epijidu , mugure Pao kana pemegarewy jaogwaidu , emare okwamagudunure pabaru tabo . Ioguduba umode padaru Cristo meardu kurii pai dypiji ? Boe ekori , boe uru koia kana ? Boe epagudu koia kana ? Boe etonai pai du koia kana ? Page boi pai du koia kana ? Pawiri kedo koia kana ? Pabagudae koia kana ? Pawimodedu koia kana ? Bapera atugo pemegarewy akore : Aigoiare cere cemagu pabimodedu kai meri jameduji , cere nono ovelhadoge eregodyi tuwi kaedu reore (Sl 43,23) . Mare boe jamedu boe keje pare pamorido , cewy meardu kurire pai du koia . Paga karega , iorduwa pemeganure iaboe iaboe emodukae pawarigu Pao meardu kurii pai dypiji . Boe ewi , jereboe , baru tadawu tupadoge , ia baru tadawu ro rakareboe , oinowu boe , aregodymodeboe , Boe eiamedu boe emugui pawygejedu , jeture pagudaboe , awy todureboe jamedu boe , iaboe iaboe , emodykare pawarigu Pao meardu kurii pai dypiji , duwure towadydo Pagimejera Jesus Cristo koia.

Israeldoge eonare bakaru maiwuji jamedu . Boe jokodu jire inagoino Cristo tada . Iwadararodu karega ure . Aroe Pemegarewy joi iwadaru kejedu koiare iorduwado iwadararodu kaegaie ure dyji . Ikiarigody kuricigo remawu nure , iwabo kori rakaguragare jamedu . Iwobe eigoia , imeardu kuri koia ei , itaidure imuguwo Pao bataru pegarewy kuda iragoje jaei Cristo piji dytabo eigoia . Paga karega , ikodu iwiri ikunure emage kodi . Pao ogenure emage , ure toredo emage , ure turugu maku etai . Ure Moisés ui boe eroiagudu maku etai . Ere tubujodo Aroe Eimejera ema remawuji . Emagere Pao akore tumodyie to boe pemegarewy maku etai . Boe eimejerage kurirewyge ekodure Pao meardae rekodajiwyge enodojiwygenure emage . Epijire Cristo buture , du jeture boe jamedu boeji , dure Aroe Eimejera rema , du jire boe emago pemegamode jii je . Oino gody . Pamagomodykare Pao bataru kodukae pudui dyji . Paga karega , buture Israel aiwyge eiamedu karega israeldogere emage . Jamedu Abraão uwobe eiamedu karege orere emage . Mare paga karega , Pao akore Abraãoji : Tu Isaac otojiwygere emode tugeragu akieji (Gn 21,12) . Awy inodu ure oino : Buture ty Pao bataru rekodajiwygere Abraão otojiwygere emage , buture boe ekodypijiwygerema karega . Mare paga karega , Pao bataru ure oino : Imode ikirimi jorumode mito ty je du otobiji , akoreduje Sara kuributumode ia tonaregedu apo (Gn 18,10) . Ia pugeje : Rebeca jamedu orere pobe , du etuore pu etuoce : Pagododaiwu Isaac . Nowy Rebeca ore ewudumodedu otodai , ero pegakare , ero pemegakare kimodu otodai , Pao akore Rebecaji : Kodure boetojiwure kodure boiwu utugaremode ema (Gn 25,23) . Oinore Pao ure tugeragu jiwygere ure tugeragu ei taidu rekodaji , mare ero koia karega . Uwo nono bapera atugo reore : Imeardu kuricigore Jacóji , ikodu kagirire Esauji (Ml 1,3) Kode , inoba pagagomode ? Pagagomode boe jetorokarewy muguie Pao apo , oino kana ? Boro ! Ukare ino ! Paga karega , akore oino Moisesji : Imeardu kurimode itaidure imeardu kuriwo jiwuji , inogudumode itaidure inogudywo apowu apo jamedu (Ex 33,19) . Dykodi icare awy inodu ukare ime etaidu reore , iarema ime ero reore , mare ty Pao okudu reore . Boekare , bapera atugo pemegarewy keje padure Pao akoi Faraó jidu : Awy inodu bogaire ire boe eimejerado aki , awy moto kejewy boe eiamedu boe eerduwawo ikieji (Cr 6,33) . Dykodi icare Pao okudure taidure jiwu apo , ure taidure jiwu uwabo rakado . Mare akagomode oino ii : U . Oino dykeje , kodiba Pao korigodymode imei kimo ? Ioguduba umode tao tugu Pao aidure jiboe kuda ? Imedyia , ioguduba ure aki akorigodywo Paoji ? Ruwobo akomodu kana ure tudowyjewuji : Kodiba are itowyje ? oino ? Mare ure ruwobo towyjewy umode ia ruwobo tuginoiwu towyje , iarema ia ruwobo pega pegarewy towyje , nowy rotu mito dytabo . Oinore Pao rore : aidure tuwo tugody kagirii awadydo , aidure tuwo turo raka awadydo . Dykodire upagare tuwudugu kuricigo tabo , boe ekorimode eiwygei , umode tubegadowygei jamedu . Aidure tuwo turugu maedo togudure apowyge paiogi , ure tugera pemegado pai turugu makudywo pagai du bogai . Makore pawogai , mare judeudoge epiji ty je karega , mare judeukare emawyge epiji jamedu . Oinore akore Osias o bapera keje : Imagomode iwobe oino iwobekare emawygei . Imagomode itaidure jiwudo oino itaidukare jiwudoji . Cewu boe egore : Iwobe karega ure tagi oino ei , dykeje boe egomode ei : Pao jerewy orenure tagi . (Os 2,25) . Isaias jamedu akore israeldogei : Israeldoge emagaguragamode nono pobo maerewy tadawu kugaru reore , mare du inodytabo ia ekobore cinorudodumode ty je . Paga karega Pao umode tuwadaru ko kuri je moto keje (Is 1,9) . Oinore Isaias mitodu akore marigudu : Pagimejera ro rakarewy umodykare iaboe etore eragoje kimodo pagai ma , pamode nono Sodoma , Gomorra bakurirewyge ereore (Is 1,9) . Kode , inoba pagagomode ? Judeukare emawyge eemarukai tuiedorododywo du bogai , mare eedorododure tumeartoru koia . Mare Israeldoge tuiemarui tuiedorododywo du bogai boe eroiagudu koia , eerdukare tuiemarure bogai boeji . Kodiba ? Kodiba karega , mare eemarure nowy inodu bogai tumeartoru koia karega , mare turo koia . Ewure jeture toriji , dykodire ewudure . Bapera atugo pemegarewy rekodaji : Imode ia tori kurirewy mugudo Sion bakurirewy keje boe ewudydody epace , mare emeartorure jiwyge boe keadumodykare ei (Is 28,18 ; 8,14).

Moisés ui boe eroiagudu ure judeudoge erego Jesus ae , mare emeartorukare ji . Iwiemage , itaidure iwabo jamedytabo iwobe einorudodywo , inogwamagudunure Paoji etai . Iorduware etaidu rakaguragaie Pao jituji , mare etaidui jitu bure jokare boe jetororewy keje . Eerduware inoba Paore boe eedorodo dyji , tuiemarui tuwo tuiedorodo tumeardae reore dytabo . Ewiapagare Pao ui boe eedorodo dyji . Mare paga karega , Cristo kaere boe eroiagudu akedure , uwo meartorurewyge eiamedu boe eedorodo . Moisés ure bapera atugodo boe eedorogodyreboe aregodyi boe eroiagudypijiboe reo : Rore nono boe eroiagudu reorewy , jemode koia . Mare ure boe eedorodoboe aregodyi boe emeartoru pijiwu akore oino : Akago kaba oino awabo tada : Ioguduba rutumode baruto ? (tuwo Cristo arego baru piji) . Iarema : Ioguduba umode turawyje jewuduioto ? (tuwo Cristo rutudo birewyge epiji) . Mare bapera atugo pemegarewy akore : Pao bataru mugu puredure ai , mugure akogwa keje , mugure awabo tada (Deut 30,14) . Awy boe emeartorure jiwu , cere kogadowu bataru reno . Paga karega , amagomode akogwa tabo Boe Eimejeranure Jesusce oino , awabo tada ameartorumode Pao ui jewodydo birewyge epiji dyji ma , amode akinorudo . Boe emeartorui tuwabo tada dytabo emode tuiedorodo , boe emagoi togwa tabo dytabo , emode cinorudo . Bapera atugo pemegarewy akore oino : Meartorure jiwyge emodykare tuiekuri pagado (Is 28,16) . Judeudoge , gregodoge , epadukare pumekeje , eimejerare tugimejerace kodi . Ure toroe pemegarewy kuricigorewy maku okwamagudure puduiwyge etai . Bapera atugo ako reore : Okwamagudure Pao jiwyge emode cinorudo (Jl 3,5) . Mare inoba emode turodo togwamagudywo ji tuiorduwakai jitu tabo ? Inoba emeartorumode ji tumeardukai bataru jitu tabo ? Inoba eromode tumeardywo bataru kogadodukai pudui dytabo ? Inoba awy bataru kagadodumode ure kogadoboe bokware dytabo ? Inoba boe emode bataru kogado boekai erojai dytabo ? Bapera atugo pemegarewy akore : Oinore ure Pao bataru pemegarewy kogadowyge ewure , ewure motu remawu nure (Is 52,7) Mare boe eiamedu karega etaidure bataru maiwu pemegarewyji . Awy inodu jire profeta Isaias akore marigudu : Ikimejera , ioguduba meartorumode amagore jiboeji ? (Is 53,1) . Dykodi icare boe emeartoru aregodyre boei Cristo bataru kogado dypiji . Mare inoramode : Boe emearuduka du kana ji ? U ! Emearudure ji . Ure nono bapera atugo ako reore : Boe emeardure emagoji moto jamedu boe keje ; ewadaru aregodyre jii moto okwa pa kae (Sl 18,5) . Inoramode kimo : Israeldoge ekadu kana ere boe pa ji ? Ica , Moisés akore ei marigudu : Imode tagimaredydo boe jokodukare emawu ia boei . Imode tagody kagirido ia aeroga bokwarewy boei (Deut 32,21) . Isaias jamedu akore : Jemarukarewyge eerdure ii , ire itowadydo unorakare iwogaiwyge etai (Is 65,1) . Mare Israeldoge eiboe jire Isaias makore oino : Meri jameduji ire ikera raido ia boe pegarewyge emeartorukare iwadaru jiwyge etai (Is 65,2).

Pao umodykare tuwobe Israeldoge ewarigu tubiji jii je . Inoragodywo kimo : Pao ure tuwobe ewarigu tubiji ? Boro ! Ukare ino ! Imi israelitanure imi , Abraão otojiwu , iwobenure Benjamim uwobece . Pao ure tugeragu jiwu tuwobe ukare ewarigu tubiji . Taerduware bapera atugo akoi : Ikimejera , ere ako profetadoge ewido , ere boe enogwa kuridodure kejewy ako ira pegado . Imire iragojere mito ty je , mare etaidure tuwo iwido jamedu (lReis 19,10) . Inoba Pao akore bataru jipagi ? Akore : Ire imei 7.000 cedu edo tuginoi inai , duwyge ekare tubujodo Baal jokorai (lReis 19,18) . Awy inodure ure tudowyje oino mai jamedu , Pao o boe pemegarewy koia : ure tugeragu pudaiwyge enowarore ty je . Pao umode tugeragu iaboei pudae boe ero koia ma , awy inodytabo Pao o boe pemegarewy umodukaradu pudumi pugeje . Inoba pagagomode ? Israeldoge eerdukae tuiemarure bogaiboeji ? Paore tugeragu jiwyge eerdure ji ty rugadu . Emedagere tuwiaja mi Pao makoi tuwogai dyji . Padu magai bapera keje du reore : Ure nori korireboe jetudo ei ; ure eeku maku etai , mare eerdukawo ; ure ewiaja maku etai , mare emeardukawo , jii oino awy meri kae (Deut 29,3) . Davi jamedu akore : Enogwage ure epegado , ure ewudydo , ure boe edo etogorido . Eeku mituwo eerdukawo boeji , eedawu upowo jii je (S169,s) . Inoramode pugeje : Ewure jore boeto ewudywo jii je ? Boro ! Ukare ino . Mare nowy ero pega koiare , boei cinorudody aregodyre judeukare emawyge etai . Nowy inodu ure etaidydo tuwo tubemegado . Kode , Judeudoge ero pegarewy ure awy moto oroe pemegarewy kurirewy arego ma , enoroe marenaru ure judeukare emawyge enoroe pemegarewy arego ma , icare judeudoge eiamedu boe emode tuiekirimi Pao bogai pugeje dykeje , Pao o boe pemegarewy kodu kuricigomode tao kae . Oino inagomode judeukare emawyge tai : Apostoloi imi judeukare emawyge etaidu koiare inojarore imaragodaeji . Awy iroino dytabo , iwobe etaidumodurae tuwo tubemegado jamedu , oino dytabo iage emode cinorudo rabodu . Mare paga karega , Pao ure judeudoge ewarigu tubiji dykeje , awy moto kejeboe ure tumeduiado Paoce ma , kode inoba boemode Pao umode edo tuiekirimi pugeje dykeje ? Birewyge eewodu reorere boemode . Kodure boetojiwu amirewy makudure Pao aima , amirewy jamedu boe pemegamode . I ukwa boe makudumode Pao ai ma , nowy i itura boe onure ema jamedu . Ia bai paruwu oliveira itura kadodure , ia boe tadawu oliveira boere bu nowy bai paruwu oliveira jekoboto . Tagi judeukare emawyge taebatodure nowy boe tadawu oliveira i jiboeji . Judeudoge eebatodure nowy bai paruwu oliveira i jiboeji . Ica , oino tagi nowy bai paruwu oliveira i paru kuru makudure tagai . Dykodi icare tamodykare nowy kadodurewy itura pijido , tamodykare tagojarodo tai : Ituranure tagi ty rugadu : Tagi karega tare nowy i paru jedo , nowy i paru koiare ure taedo . Mare tagagomode : U ! Mare nowy itura paru kadodure cemuguwo nowy itura kobo keje . Boe jokodu . Ekadodure tumeartoru bokwa kodi . Akirema aedure nowy jekobo keje ameartorure kodi . Mare akojarokaba ai nowy inodykodi , mare apagudydo . Pao ure boe pegado judeudogei , duwygere itura ema remawygere emage , kode aki apagudydo umode boe pegado ai dyji . Aerdu pemegado : Pao pemegare boei , mare rokicarure boei jamedu . Rokicarure ro pegarewygei , pemegare ai akodu kimomode apemega tabo du tonaji . Umodykare ino ma , akadodumode jamedu . Emage jamedu emode tugera ra tumeartoru bokwa piji dykeje , eedumode nowy jekobo keje pugeje . Paga karega , Pao roiware tuwo eedo nowy i jekobo keje pugeje . Mare akadodure oliveira pegarewy i jekobo piji aedywo nowy oliveira pemegarewy i paru jekobo keje ma , ema remawunure nowy kadodure oliveira pemegarewy i pijiwyge eedodumode tubaru jekobo keje pugeje . Iwiemage , itaidukare taerduwakawo awy boe biarewy pemegarewyji , tameardukawo tadoda taerduwa rakaguragaie ure dyji . Awy Israeldoge eeku bokwaredy umodykare ino jii je , mare umode ino jii judeukare emawyge eiamedu boe etaregodymode Pao ae du kae ty je . Dykeje Israeldoge eiamedu einorudodumode . Oinore bapera atugo pemegarewy akore : Sion pijire umode boe einorudowu aregodymode , umode Jacó otojiwyge ero pegarewy jamedu boe barigu epiji . Imode imeardae pemegarewy maku etai ii ero pegarewy barigu epiji du rekodaji (Is 59,20 ; 27,9) . Boe jokodu oino etonare Pao bakaru maiwuji taigoia , mare Pao meardu kurire ei , kodure etododaiwyge eigoia , ure togedo ei du koia . Paga karega , Pao makore boe ewogaiboe , ure maku boe etaiboe , Pao umodykare tugeragu epiji pugeje . Tagi jamedu , ia jao tameartorukare Pao bataruji , mare oino Pao okudure tagabo , judeudoge ei tudugu Pao bataru kudu dykodi . Du reorere oino emeartorukare duma , Pao okudywo ebo jamedu , togudui tagabo du koia . Paga karega Paore boe eedydo boe emeartorukai pudui du tada , mare togudywo boe eiamedu apo du bogai . Pao oroe pemegarewy kuri remawu nure ! Jorduwa mearduwa rakaguraga remawu nure ! Boe eremodumodykare meardae boeto . 34Ioguduba umode Pagimejera meardae pawyje ? Ioguduba okituwamode ji ? Ioguduba ure iaboe maku ai , uwo nowy ture maku aiboe mori makudywo pudai ? (Cfr Is 40,13) . Mare paga karega , Pao koiare ure boe jamedu boe towyje , boe jamedu boe jetu kimore koia , pudai jamedu ; Boe eiamedu boe etaidywo ji jii je . Oino gody.

Boe enogudui puapodu . Dykodire , iwiemage , inogwamagudumode tai , Pao okudu kuricigoi pagabo du koia , tawo taiamedu boe maku Pao ai , tawo tado nono ia jerewy makudureboe pemegarewy reore , dure Pao jekaredo . Awy inodure tamode maku Pao ai tagaroe tabo . Tagody kaba awy moto kejeboe reore , mare tado taginoi , tai tameardae pemegado dytabo . Awy inodytabo tamode boe pa Pao aidure jiboeji , taerduwamode kaboba pemegare , kaboba jiba Pao aidure . Pao o boe pemegarewy makudure inaiwu ro raka koia inagomode oino taiamedu boe tai : Tameardae kaba tabemega kodui taredy reore kori . Tawiegado tai tameardae tabo . Tagogado tai tagaobiji tameartoru makudui tagai du reore . Tagado awy inoduji ka : Paredy ure mito ty je , dytabore ure pagana , pabogora , ere tuginoi pubiji etamagadukare puamagadure . Du reorere pare jamedu : Pamagare , mare pare mitotu Cristo tada . Paiamedu boe pabore puapo , nono boe ekana , boe epogora , boe etaora ei tuginoi dytabore ere boe eredu mito ty je du reore . Makudure Pao piji pagaiboe ure tuginoi . Makudure aiwu tuwo Pao bataru kogadowu , rodo ino tumeartoru rekodaji . Boe emaragodae makudure ia boe etai ma , emaragodywo ; boe eerduwadody makudure iaboe etai ma , emode boe eerduwado . Okituwadodureboe makudure iaboe etai ma , enogituwado boei ; iage ere makudu pagareboe maku marenarue etai ma , maku taidytabo ; iage eeture boei ma , eetu pemegado ei . Iage ere tugerabraredo tumedagei ma , emode tugerabraredo ei tuiegare tabo . Tagaba tagogudydo boe ebo boe eegai ty je . Tagorido pegareboeji , tagodydo boe pemegarewy rekodaji . Tameardu kurido pui tameardu kuri magai tawiemage ei du reore : Tagaidydo tawo tagerabraredo tamedagei boetoji . Tamaragody kuricigodo , tagera kiari kaba : Tagurido Paoji tawabo jekare tabo . Taegaredo tabagare bogaiboe koia . Tagaba tado ty tai rakare taiboeji ; tagaba tamagomode tabaru tabodypijido . Ia tagoroe boe maku tawiemage marenarue etai , tawai jado ia moto tuginoiwu pijiwyge etai . Tamagodo Paoji uwo to boe pemegarewy maku onare taiwyge etai . U ! Tamagodo ji , uwo to boe pemegarewy maku etai , mare uwo tuwadaru pegado ei karega . Taegaredo ure tuiegaredowyge ebo , tagoragudydo uragodyreboe ebo jamedu . Tawudugugo pui . Tagojaro kaba tai . Tamaragodydo tamedage etaidukare tumaragodywo jiboeji . Tamago kaba taerduwa rakaguragaie dyji . Tagaba boe ero pegarewy morido taro pegarewy tabo . Boe eiamedu boe eerdu pemegare jiboejire tamode towyje . Tabewudo tai taroiwa reore tawo taragoje pemegado puapo . Tagaba boe ero pegarewy morido tagera tabo , mare Paodo awy inodu morido . Paga karega , bapera atugo pemegarewy akore : Imode imorido , imode ikogado nowy inoduji , oinore Pagimejera akore (Deut 32,35) . Bapera atugo pemegarewy akore jamedu : Ia onare aiwu uke boimode ji ma , okwagedo ; pobo boimode ji ma , kudydo jamedu . Nowy inodytabo , amode kowu tuboguru koia (Prov 25,21) . Tagaba boe pegarewydo tumorido tai , mare tamorido boe pegarewyji boe pemegarewy tabo.

Boe emeartorui tugimejerage eidu . Boe eiamedu boe ewiapagado tugimejeragei . Paga karega , Boe eimejerage ero raka jamedu boe aregodyre Aroe Eimejera piji . Dykodi icare biapagakare tugimejerage eiwyge , Pao jire ewiapagakare . Ure tao tugu tugimejerage ewadaru kudawyge etaidure boe pegawo pudui . Ro pegarewyge ty je epagudumode tugimejeragei , pemegarewygerema epagudumodykare  . Akaidukare apagudywo akimejeragece dykeje , aro pemegado , oino emago pemegamode ai . Paga karega , emagere Pao ure boe eimejeragedo emage akai , mare aro pegamode ma , apagudydo , mare paga karega , ero raka makudure etai ewo boe pegado ai du bogai : Pao aire emaragodyre tuwo boe eedorodo du bogai , tuwo boe pegado ro pegarewyge ei du bogai . Dykodire awiapagamode boe eimejeragei , mare ty apagudu koia karega , mare Pao makonure awabo tada dykodi . Dykodire boere toroe arudu morido pemega pugeje tugimejerage etai , mare paga karega , eromode nono turomodedu reore , Pao aire roino . Du kode , tamode makuboe maku tagimejerage etai , tagoroe arudu morido pemega pugeje etai , tawiapagado ei , tagurido ei . Ia tagoroe mori bokwa kaba boe etai ; mare tamode mori maku etaiboere , tameardu kurii eidu rema . Meardu kurire tumedage eiwu , ure boe eroiagudu jamedu boe to . Boe eroiagudu reo : Aerebari kaba , akaba boe ewido , akiwogu kaba , akagemo kaba amedage enoroeji . Awy boe eroiagudu inodu , iagere kimodu , akedure ty awy kae : Ameardu kurimode amedagei , ameardu kuri magai ai du reore . Meardu kurire tumedage eiwu , ro pegamodykare tumeduiaji . Dykodire boe emeardu kurii tumedage eidykejere boe eroiagudu jamedu jeture keje . Oinore taromode rugadu . Taerduware kakoduwu boe kejeba paragojere ; boere turugadu taedadywo tanu piji . Paginorudodae puredure pai , cewy pameartorure ca jewy kori . Boeco akedugody nure , meri joku aregody nure . Dykodire pawo paro pegarewy pijido ; pawo pado parugadu paro pemegarewy urugureboe tabo . Pawo pado nono iaboere boeji , rakojere jorugu tadaboe ereore . Ia boe eegare pegarewy piji , boe ekudui kuru korireboe cedypiji , ia taro pemega jokodu karewy piji , tagemo pegarewy piji , tarugody piji , tagorii puidypiji . Paci oino : Pagimejera Jesus Cristo metudo tadoda . Tawiapaga kaba boe ekoduji , tarokaba nono tawiri tagody aidu reore.

Pakawo pagogado pui jice woje . Tamode tageragu meartoru rakakarewyji tabemega tabo , tamagokai ji ia meardae jorudae jiboeji . Pawo inodu jebato awy inoduji : iage emeardaere turoiwamodyie tuwo boe jamedu boe ko ; iage ere kimoreboe kowyje ty je , turo rakakadu koia . Okwagere boe jamedu boe jiwu , ukaba okwagekare boe jamedu boe jiwu redugodydo pudui . Okwage bokwarewy ukaba tugogado okwagerewyji . Paga karega , Pao umode tugeragu ji pudai jamedu . Kaboba akibao awo akogado iage etugareji ? Tu ukimejera umode tugogado ji , rakojemode dyji , butumode dyji . Rakojemode rugadu . Mare paga karega , ukimejera umode tugerabraredo ji . Iage emeardaere ia meri koduie tumedage ekori , iage emeardaere eie nono pureore . Eiamedu kodywo ty tu tumeardae rekodaji . Nowy meardaere ia meri kuduie tumedage ekoriwu , rore oinono tuwo Pagimejera jekaredo du bogai . Nowy okwagere boe jamedu jiwu rore ino jamedu tuwo Pao jekaredo du bogai . Okwagekare ia boe ere kowyjeboe jiwu rore ino jamedu tuwo Pao kurido , ure Pao jekaredo . Mare paga karega , ia pagi , ia pagi paekare pagai rugadu , pawikare pagai jamedu . Mare paenure pagimejera Aroe Eimejera ai , pawimode Pao ai jamedu . Dykodire paemode , pawimode ma , pagimejera onure pagi . Mare paga karega , Cristo bire , jewodure birewyge epiji pugeje , duma birewyge , jerewyge eimejerawo pudumi du bogai . Kode kodiba are boe pegado awieji ? Kodiba are redugodydo pudui ? Paiamedu paedumode Pao jokorai , tuwo tugogado pai du bogai . Bapera atugo pemegarewy akore : Pagimejera akore : Ie koia imagomode oino : boe eiamedu boe emode tubujodo ii , boe eiamedu boe egomode Aroe Eimejeraie ure imi rugadu dyji (Is 45,23) . Dykodire paiamedu boe pamode pagogado pai Pao jekai . Dykodi icare pamodykare pagogado pui pugeje . Paci oino , taemarudo takawo tawie butudo boe pegarewyto . Iorduwa jokodunure Pagimejera Jesus Cristo tada , iaboe iaboe boe pegakae pudui dyji , mare iaboe emeardaemode iaboe boe pegaie ma , pudaire pegamode mito ty je . Amode awie kiarigo are koboe du koia ma , mare ameardu kurii boei du koia karega aroino . Akaba nowy Cristo bire aiwu barigu boe pegarewyto are kowyjeboe koia . Dykodire ako boe pemegarewy ukado amedage emago pegado ai . Boe eke , boe ekudure ceboe karega ure Pao o boe pemegarewy rema , mare u boe jetororewy , boe butugurewy , boe eegareae Aroe Pemegarewy koia . Rore oino Cristo aiwu ure Pao jekaredo , boe emeardae pemegamode ji jamedu . Dykodire paemarumode umode boe butugurewy arego du bogai , umode pamedage epewudo pudui tumeartoraeji du bogai jamedu . Akaba are kowyjeboe Paore towyjeboe pegado . Boere kowyjeboe jamedu boe pemegare , mare boere kowyjeboe umode boe ewudydo boe ero pegarewyto ma , nowure jetorokare . Mare boe emodykare kodureboe kowyje , boe ekudumodykare parera kuruce , boe emode ia turo pijido , tukawo tuwie reko turo pegarewyto ma , nowy inodure jetorore . Ameartorure ? Icare akedu akado ameartoraeji akai Pao jekai . Jiwo aidugirirewy ukare tuwarigu boe pegarewyto tui turodo nono taidu pemegare oinoie turomodedu jitu keje . Mare iaboe emode iaboe kowyje tui tugogado ture kowyjeboeji ma , unure tuwarigu boe pegarewyto , kodukare tumeartoru rekodaji kodi . Kodukare boe emeartoru pemegarewy rekodajiboe jamedu boe , boe ero pegarewy rema.

Boewo tuwudugugo rorakarewygei Jesus ro magadu reore . Meartoru rakarewyge pagi , pamode pagerabraredo meartoru rakakarewygei , mare paromodykare nono pagaidu reore . Paiamedu boe parowo nono pawiemage etaidu reore , boe pemegawo ei , emeartoru kodywo tao kae du bogai . Cristo jamedu rokare nono taidu reore jamedu du karega , bapera atugo pemegarewy ako reorere boere tudowyje ji : 
Mako pegare aiwyge emago pegarewy buture iwygeje . (Sl 68,10) . Aró kode , padure bapera atugo pemegarewy kejeboe jamedu boe , padure keje paerduwawo ji , duma pabagawo boe pemegarewy bogai , boe butugurewy , boe eegareae aregodyre pagai bapera atugo pemegarewy piji du koia . Itaidure Pao ure boe butugurewy , boe eegareae maku boe etaidu , uwo tugerabraredo tai tagogudywo puapo pureore , Pagimejera Jesus Cristo ro rekodaji . Duma , taiamedu puapo , tai mito ty jedu reore taegarewo Pao Aroe Eimejeraji , Pagimejera Jesus Cristo Uoji du bogai . Dykodire , tageragu pui , Pagimejera Jesus Cristo magai ure tugeragu pai du reore , boe emago pemegawo Pao jitu bogai . Boe jokodu jire inagoino Cristo ure judeudoge etugaredo pudumi tuwo boe eerdydo Paoi togudydo boe ebo dyji , tuwadaru rekodaji , turoi nono tagoi turomode jiboe patriarcadoge ewiegai du reore . Judeukare emawyge eiboe , ere Pao jekaredo ty okudure boei du koia . Bapera atugo pemegarewy ako reore : Dykodire imode aegaredo judeukare emawyge etada , imode akie kurido (x 34,6) . Boe epadui pumekejedu , taegaredo uwoboe remawyge ebo . Ia pugeje , bapera atugo akore pugeje : Judeukare emawyge eiamedu boe eegaremode Paoji , boe eiamedu boe epadui pumekejedu emode Pao jekaredo du kuricigodo (Sl 116,1) . Isaias akore jamedu : Ia Jessé otobijiwu aregodymode tuietui boe epadui pumekejedu jamedu boei , judeukare emawyge epagamode bogai (Is 11,10) . Dykodi icare Pao , koiare ure pado pabagadodu , umode taegare kuricigodo , umode boe butugurewydo tai tameartorui pudui du koia , duma tabagare bogaiboe itodywo Aroe Pemegarewy ro raka koia.
Paulo mare Roma kejewy Pao uwobe . Iwiemage , iorduwa jokodunure tabemega remawuie ure dyji , taerduwa remawuie ure dyji tagogituwawo pui du bogai . Mare ire awy bapera atugodo tawogai ipagudu bokwa tabo tawia jetuwo boe jitu bogai , awy Paore maku inaiwu to boe pemegarewy koia . Ure maku inaiwu to boe pemegarewy reo : Jesus Cristore tudugaredo imi , imaragodywo judeukare emawyge etada . Pao burejoia maragodae jiboe iroino , ii Pao o bataru pemegarewy kogado dytabo . Duma judeukare emawyge emagudywo Pao ai du bogai , Aroe Pemegarewy koia . Dykodire inojaromode imaragodyi Pao ai dyji , Cristo apo . Imagomode Cristo roi itabo iwo judeukare emawyge erego tumeartoruwo Pao o bataru jitu bogai dyji ty je . Awy inodu towyjedure cewadaru boe tabo , cero boe tabo . Pao ro rakarewy tuginoiwu ro raka tabo , Aroe Pemegarewy ro raka koia . Awy inodykodire ire Cristo o bataru pemegarewy kogado Jerusalém keje , oieiwu moto piji jii Ilíria moto kae . Ire awy bataru pemegarewy kogado meardukare Cristo ie jiwu boe eeda keje , imagokawo iage enogwa rekodaji . Du ure nono bapera atugo reore : Cewu boe emagokare ji biegaiwyge , eerdumode ji ; cewy meardukare boe egoi jitu jiwyge eerduwamode ji . (Is 52,15) . Du inodure ure iroiwa bokwado du kuricigodo jii oino ituwo tawogai . Mare oino ire imaragodae akedydo awy moto keje . Joru makaguragare itaidui ikodywo tawogai dyji . Itui Espanha kae dytabo , ipagamode iordywo tai ; iragojei tagabo du rekodaji imeartorure ia tagi tamode irego nowy moto kae dyji . Mare oino maigody itumode Jerusalém kae iwo ikerabraredo pawiemage torowygei . Macedônia kejewy , Acaia kejewy pawiemage etaidu pemegare tuwo ia toroe to pui tuwo reko Jerusalém kejewy pawiemage marenarue ewogai . Etaidure turowo oino , mare boe jokodu emode mori maku etai . Mare paga karega , judeudoge enoroe pemegarewy baru tadawu makudure etai , dykodire judeukare emawyge emode tugerabraredo judeudogei awy moto kejewy toroe tabo . Ii nowy maragodae to du rekodaji , ii nowy cemode maku etaiboe maku etai du rekodaji itumode Espanha kae , ikodui tagori dytabo . Iorduware ikodumode tagae dykeje imode Cristo o boe pemegarewy awadu reko tawogai dyji . Inogwamagudunure tai , iwiemage , Pagimejera Jesus Cristo ie tabo , Aroe Pemegarewy ure maku pagaiwu okudu oiagudu koia , tawo tagerabraredo ii tamagoi Paoji tawabo jamedytabo iparu tabo . Iwo ikinorudo Judéia kejewy meartorukarewyge ekera piji du bogai , imode reko Jerusalém kae pawiemage ewogaiboe ewo tugeragudu pemegado ji du bogai jamedu . Awy inodu akedykeje , itumode tawogai , iordywo tai iegare tabo ; Pao aidykeje , ipagamode iwo itamudo biega ty je tadoda jamedu . Pao , koiare ure boe butugurewy maku tagaidu muguwo tagabo . Oino gody . 

Boe enogituwae , boe eimadudae . Inogwamagudumode tai paduie Febe paru tabo ; cewy maragodyre Cencreia kejewy Igreja kejewudo , Tawo tageragu ji Pagimejera ie tabo , nono pawiemage pemegarewyge ero reore , tawo tagerabraredo ji ia aidure jiboe tabo ; paga karega , ure tugerabraredody kuricigodo makarewygei , ii jamedu . Ikimadure Prisca , Aquila , ewogai , duwygere imedagere emage Jesus Cristo tada . Ere tuiagu tumagu tuwidody kai inai ; awy du koia inure tukutaido ei , igrejadoge eiamedu boe emode tukutaido ei jamedu . Ikimadure pawiemage eedui ewai tadawu ewogai jamedu . Ikimadure imeardu kurire jiwu Epêneto bogai , duwure Asia kejewyge etada boetojiwu meartorure Cristoji . Ikimadure Maria bogai , duwudo maragody kuricigore tadoda . Ikimadure Andrénico bogai , Júnia bogai , duwygere iwobere emage , imedagere emage baicorewy tada , apostolodoge emeardu kurire ei , emeartorure Cristoji itododai . Ikimadure Ampliato bogai , duwure itaidu kuricigore jiwu imedyia rema , pagimejera tada . Ikimadure Cristo tadawu imedyia Urbano bogai , imeardu kuricigore jiwu imedyia Estóquio bogai jamedu . Ikimadure Apeles bogai duwure boe okorire ji Cristo koia . Ikimadure Arsitóbulo uwobe ewogai . Ikimadure iwobe Herodião bogai . Ikimadure makudure Cristo aiwyge Narciso uwobe ewogai . Ikimadure Triana bogai , Trifosa bogai , duwygere emaragodynure Pagimejera ai . Ikimadure imeardu kurire jiwudo Pérside bogai , duwudo maragody kuricigore Pagimejera ai jamedu . Ikimadure Rufo bogai , duwure Pagimejerare tugeragu ji pudai tumedage epiji , uce bogai jamedu , duwudo imuga inodunure ema . Ikimadure Asíncrito , Flegonte , Hermas , Patrobras , Hermes , ewogai , pawiemage eedui ebodu bogai jamedu . Ikimadure Filólogo bogai , Júlia bogai , Nerewy mare uwie ewogai , Olímpia bogai , rakojere ebowyge eiamedu boe ewogai jamedu . Tagimadydo pui tai tagogwabi pemegarewy tabo . Cristo o Igrejadoge eiamedu boe eimadure tawogai . Iwiemage , taeku jado ure tawarigu pubiji boei , ure pu meartorae pegadowyge ei , onare taerduware jiboe jiwyge ei , taiaedo ei . Nowy rore oinowyge emaragody karega ure Cristo ai mare ty tuguri toboe bogai . Ere jorduwa bokwarewyge eekuri pagado , tuwadaru beturewy tabo enure ewarigu boe pegarewyto tui ekurido pagatu je dytabo . Tameartorae akaru aregodyre boe eeda jamedu boe kae , dykodire iegarere ii , taigoia , mare itaidure boe eerduwa rakarewygewo tagi boe pemegarewyji , mare boe pegarewyji karega . Pao Aroe Eimejera koiare ure boe butugurewy maku boe etaidu , uwo Aroe pegarewyge eimejera peagirido tawure kuda . Pagimejera Jesus Cristo o boe pemegarewy muguwo tagabo . Timóteo ure tugerabraredo iidu , imadure tawogai ; Lúcio , João , Sospatro eimadure tawogai jamedu . Imi , Tércio , ure awy bapera atugododu , ikimadure tawogai Pagimejera tada : Imugure uwai tadawu Caio , mare Igreja jamedu boe eimadure tawogai . Jeture awy bakurirewy tadawyge enoroe jiwu Brastro , mare pawie Quarto eimadure tawogai . Pagimejera Jesus Cristo o boe pemegarewy muguwo taiamedytabo . Oino gody . Pao roiware tuwo taragoje rakado tameartorae keje , awy bakaru pemegarewy ire kogado boe ewiegaidu , pagimejera Jesus Cristo o bataru rekodaji . Awy inodure tudowyje Pao o boe biarewy biadodure joru makaguragarewyji ui towadydo du koia . Awy Pao o boe biarewy awadodure oino maigody , cewy profetadoge ere bu bapera keje du koia . Pao aidu koiare icare awadydodyre moto jamedu boe keje , boe eiamedu boe emeartoruwo ji , ewiapagawo ji du bogai . Pao jorduwa mearduwa kurirewy mito ty jewy boe emago pemegawo ji , Jesus Cristo koia , jii je . Oino gody.







I . CORINTIOS

PAULO O BAPERA ATUGO CORINTO KEJEWUGE EWOGAIDU BOETOJIWU

Bapera paru . Paulo , Jesus Cristo o apóstolo , mare pawie Sóstenes Pao uwobe emugui Corinto bakurirewy kejewyge ewogai , pemegagodyre Cristo koiawyge eiamedu bogai , duwygere Pao makore ewogai tuwo tubemegado , jeture ia tuieda kejewyge eiamedu boe enogwamagudui Pagimejera Jesus Cristo jiwyge ebo . Boe pemegarewy , boe butugurewy aregodyi Pao pijiwu , Pagimejera Jesus Cristo pijiwu , makudywo tagai . Jii je ire tukutaido Paoji taigoia , o boe pemegarewy makudui tagai Jesus Cristo koia du koia . Koiare ure tagoroe pemegarewy kuricigodo boe ewadaru jamedu boe tabo , boe eerduwa jamedu boe tabo . Du inodu koiare o bataru metu rakare tagabo . Nowy inodytabo , tabagai Jesus Cristo umode towadydo du bogai dytabo , boe pemegarewy kurirewy ia okwakare tagai . Emare umode taroiwa rakado jii oto kae , duma tagiwo tagi rugadu Pagimejera Jesus Cristo aregodymode jiwu meri keje ukawo boe pegado tai . Pao kodure tuwadaru rekodaji , emare makore tawogai tameduiawo Onaregedu Pagimejera Jesus Cristoce.
Pao uwobe ei tuginoi tuginoidu . Iwiemage , inogwamagudumode tai , Pagimejera Jesus Cristo ie tabo , taiamedu boe emeardywo pu meardae reore , takawo tado tuginoi tuginoi , taedydo tabemegai pui dytabo , tameardae , tagaidae mito dytabo . Paga karega , iwiemage , Cleo uwobe ere iwie tagorigodyie pui dyji . Kodiba inagoino ? Kodiba karega , ia tagi tagagore : Imire ionare Pauloji , imire ionare Apoloji , imire ionare Cefaji , imire ionare Cristoji . Kode , Cristo kadody kana jice woje tubiji ? Paulona padydodyre cruz keje tagai ? Paulo ie tabo kana tagao pegododure ? Iegarere Paoji : ikare ia tagi ia tagi tagao pegodo , Crispo , Caio , epiji ty je . Oino dytabo iaboe iaboe egomodykare tao pegododuie ikie tabo dyji . Ire Estéfanas uwobe etao pegodo jamedu . Awyge epiji toro , iwiabutukare ii iage etao pegodo rakuduie . Cristo ure irojai , mare iwo boe etao pegodo du bogai karega , mare imagowo bakaru pemegarewyji du bogai . Awy inodytabo , imagokare ji boe ewadaru moturewy tabo , ikawo Cristo o cruz barigudydo pudui.
Awy moto kejewy boe eerduwa , mare Pao uwobe eerduwa . Cruz jiwu bakaru pegajagunure ure tuwogwadowyge etai , mare inorudodurewyge pagai , Pao ro rakarewynure ema . Atugododure oino : Imode jorduwarewyge eerduwa pegado , imode meardae rakarewyge emeardae okwado 
 (Is 29,14) . Kaiba jorduwarewy rakojere ? Kaiba jorduware tuwadaru tumago jiwu rakojere ? Kaiba awy moto kejewy unora kigodyrewy rakojere ? Kode , Pao akokare awy moto kejewy mearduwareboe jorduwareboeie boe pegarewy rema ? Kode awy moto kejewy jorduwareboe mearduwareboe ekare boe pawyje Paoji tuiorduwarewy tumearduwarewy tabo ; nowy inodytabo Pao aidure tuwo meartorurewyge einorudo to bataru matadurewy cere kogado jitu tabo . Judeudoge enogwamagudure ia boe tuginoiwu kurirewy tuguwo pudai du bogai ; Grécia kejewyge eemarure jorduwareboe bogai . Cegirema cereadodure Jesus padui cruz keje dyji . Duwure judeudogere tumeardae pegarewydo ema , judeukare emawyge ere iaboe matadurewydo ema tuiegai . Mare pemegarewyge emedui judeudoge , gregodoge etadadu , Pao ro rakarewy jorduwa rakarewy rema etai . Mare paga karega , Pao o matadureboe jorduwa rakareboe rema ime eerduwa kori , Pao o rorakakareboe emare rorakareboe rema ime ero raka kori . Tagi , iwiemage , tagado ure tudo tadoda boeji : tadoda jorduwa rakarewyge emagakare ime eegai , rorakarewyge emagakare jamedu , ema remawygere emawyge bokware jamedu . Mare Pao ure awy moto kejewy boe matadureboe tawyje tuwo jorduwarewyge eerduwa bokwado . Pao ure awy moto rakakareboe tawyje tuwo rorakarewyge eroiwa bokwado jamedu . Paore awy moto jekaiwu boe pegarewy , boe barigodydodyrewy , boekare emawu , ure tawyje , uwo boe remaboe bokwado . Oinowo ia ime ia ime ekawo tojarodo pudui Pao jekai . Pao o boe pemegarewy koiare tamedure Cristo tada . Duwure Paore boe eerduwa rakarewydo ema , boe jetororewydo ema , boe pemegarewydo ema , ure boe einorudowudo ema pagai . Uwo nono bapera atugo reore : Cewu ure tojarodo puduiwu umode tojarodo pudui Pagimejera tada (Jer 9,23).

Paulo uwadodui Corinto bakurirewy kejedu . Imi jamedu , iture tagae dykeje , itukare tagae iwadaru makarewy tabo du kare , iorduwa rakarewy tabo du kare , iwo tawie Pao bataruji . Imeardaere iorduwakai iaboe boeji tadoda , mare ty Jesus Cristoji , mare Cristo padui cruz keje dyji ty je . Imugure tadoda iro rakarewy bokwa tabo , imorora amagadui ii dytabo , ipagudytabo . Iwadaru inogituwa puredukare jorduwa rakarewy ime ewadaruji ; mare paci oino , mare Pao Utaroe , Pao o jorduwa rakareboe pawyjedywo , du jire imagore tawiegai , Duma tameartorae aregodykawo ime eerduwa rakarewy piji , mare ty Pao jorduwa rakarewy piji . Mare inogituware pemegarewyge eiboe , boe eerduwa remawu rema ; mare awy moto kejewy boe eerduwa karega , awy moto kejewy boe eimejerage eerduwa karega jamedu , duwyge etagedumode . Cewadodure Pao jorduware jiboeji , boe eremodykare toboe , boe emodykare pawyjeboe jire cemagore . Pao ure awy inodydo oino , boe towyjedumodedu otodai , paegareaece , pagaidaece . Awy jorduwa rakareboe , awy moto kejewy iaboe iaboe boe eimejerage eerduwakare ji ; boe eerduwamode inoduji ma , boe emodykare Pagimejera , boe pemegarewy kurirewy jeture apowu , bu cruz keje . Mare bapera atugo pemegarewy akore : Boe eerduwakare jiboe , boe emeardukare jiboe Paore jetu otorogado cewy meardu kurire jiwyge ewogai . Mare Pao ure inodu awadydo paegai Utaroe koia , paga karega , Aroe jorduware boe jamedu boeji , jamedu Pao o boe biarewyji jamedu . Mare ioguduba jorduware ime tadaboeji ? Kode , imedy utaroe metui tadadure jorduware ty ji rugadu . Du reorere iaboe iaboe eerduwakare Pao ogere emawygei , mare ty Pao Utaroe ty rugadu . Aró , kode , awy moto kejewy aroe makudukare pagai , mare u Pao Utaroe ty rugadu , duwu koiare ure paerduwado Pao o boe pemegarewy makudui pagai dyji . Cere inodu kogado , mare boe ere ceerduwado jiwu boe ewadaru tabo karega , mare Aroere ceerduwado jiwu bataru tabo . Awy Aroe makore aroe jiboeji , aroe o bataru tabo . Mare awy moto kejewy imedy aidukare aregodyre Pao Utaroe pijiboeji , mare paga karega , nowy inodure matadureboe reoreboere ai , jamedu umodykare nowy inodu pawyje , mare paga karega , ty Aroe koiare ure boedo boe pawyje ji . Mare biapagare Aroe jiwu imedy , ure tugogado boe jamedu boeji , iaboe iaboe ukare tugogado ji . Ioguduba jorduware Pao meardaeji tuwo jorduwado ? (Is 40,13) . Pagirema pameardaere Jesus Cristo meardaeji.

Ure Pao o bataru kogadowyge emaragodae . Imi , iwiemage , iroiwakare imagowo tai biapagare Aroe jiwu ime eidu reore , mare imagore tai nono biapagare tugody jiboe ei du reore , Cristo aiwu boe etore kugure ei du reore . Ire mokuru kurureboe maku tagai , mare tagiwa rakamodykare jiwu boe eke karega . Tagiwa rakakare ji , tagorogu kugudu kimore du koia . Paga karega , tadoda tagorire pui , tarugodyre pui , dykodire tawiapaganure tagodyji kimo , tare nono awy moto kejewy ime ereore kimo . Paga karega , tagagoi : ionare Pauloji , ionare Apoloji , oino dytabo , takare nono biapagare tugody jiwu ime ereore ? Kode , kaboba Paulo rema ? Kaboba Apolo rema ? U ! Boe karega ure emage , utugare boenure ty emage . Eigoiare ere tameartoru maku tagai , Pao ui maku ty tu boe etai du reore . Ire boe tugu , Apolore pegodo , Paorema ure ricodydo . Oino ure tuguwu boe karega , jamedu ure pegodowu boe karega jamedu , mare Pao ty rugadu , koiare ure ricodydo . Ure tuguwu , ure pegodowu ere nono pureore , mare mori makudumode etai nono emaragodae reore . Cegi cemaragodyre Pao apo , tagire cere towyjewy Pao o boepanure tagi . Pao uwainure tagi . Pao o boe pemegarewy makudure inai du rekodaji , ire bai oiagejewy bure tugu , ii bai mugudody epa remawui imi dytabo , iare aogejewy towyje . Tagaiwodo ty tu inoba umode ao jiwu towyje . Boe emodykare ia bai oiagejewy bure towyje pugeje , mare cewy bure tugudure ty rugadu , dure Jesus Cristo rema ty rugadu . Ia boe emode bai mugudo awy aogeje ia meriri ekurewy tabo , ia meriri kigadurewy tabo rabodu , ia tori moturewy tabo rabodu , iarema ia ira tabo rabodu , ia boebutu tabo rabodu , ia bai tabo rabodu . Nowy inodu umode towadydo ia meriji nowy roinowyge etai . Nowy meriji , joru umode boe emaragodae udo towadydo , umode maragodyrewyge emaragodae bu ty tu ewygeje . Joru umodykare nowy bai kowu dykeje , ure towu mori makudumode ai . Mare kodumode dykeje , mori bokwamode ji , umode cinorudo , mare umode tuwu joru kajeje . Kode , taerduwakare Pao uwaie ure tagiduji ? Taerduwakare Pao Utaroe muguie tadoda dyji ? Cewu umode Pao uwai pegadowu , Pao umode pegado jamedu , paga karega , Pao uwai , duwygenure tagi , boe pemegarewy rema . Tagaba taekuri pagado tagaobiji . Ia tagi tamode taerduwa rakado tadoda awy moto kejeboe rekodaji ma , kode , tado nono ia matadureboe reore , dywo nono taerduwa rakaguragaiedu jiwore . Paga karega , awy moto kejewy jorduwa rakareboe matadureboenure ema Pao jekai . Paga karega , atugododure oino : Imode ikeragu jorduwa rakarewygei emeardae pegarewy koia (Jo 5 , 13) . Ia keje , atugododure oino jamedu : Pagimejera jorduware jorduwa rakarewyge emeardaeji , jorduware boe paga pagawuie ema dyji (S1 93,11) . Dykodire tagaba tameartoru bu ime ewygeje . Boe jamedu boe tagonure ema . Paulo , Apolo , Pedro , awy moto , jereboe , bireboe , awy meri jiboe , barogwatoboe , jamedu boe tagonure ema . Mare tagi , Cristo ogenure tagi . Pao onure Cristoce.

Tu Paore umode tugogado maragodyre pudaiwygei . Kode eiamedu boe emode cedo nono maragodyre Cristo aiwyge ereore , jeture Pao o boe biarewy pemegarewy jiwyge ereore . Aró , kode , jeture boe jiwu jetoromode turo boeji . Ipagudukare tadugui iiduji , ipagudukare boe eimejerage ei tugogado iiduji ; imi jamedu imodykare ikogado ii itaobiji . Itadaboe umodykare ipogurudo ia iro keje . Mare inodytabo , imagomodykare jetororeboeie ure imi dyji . Pagimejera umode tugogado ii . Kode , tadugu kaba boei boe aregodykai pudae dyotodai , mare tawudugugudo jii Pagimejera aregody kae . Umode boe urugudo biadodure coreboe tadaboeji . Umode boe edo boe pawyje ime emeardaeji . Nowy inodykeje Pao mako pemegamode pai ty tu pareore . Inagore nowy inodu jamedu boeji , iiboeji , Apolo jiboeji , taigoia : taerduwawo , tagody kawo nowy bapera atugo ao kae , iaboe iaboe enojarokawo pudui , tuwiapagai jice woje cei . Kakoduwu koiaba ure akurido ? Ure akaboboe jamedu boe makudukare akai ? Kode , makudydodyre akai ma , kodiba akojarore ai , makudu karega ure akai dykodiwore ? Taguredure , tagoroe kuricigore , boe eimejeragenure tagi ceiageje . Ica , boe eimejerage jokodu remawygedo tagi , boe eimejeragewo cegi tagabo jamedu . Imeardaere Paoie apostolodoge cegi cedydo boe opo kejeduji , bimodeboe reore : Cedure moto keje boe eerdaece , boe eegai , tupadoge eegai jamedu . Cristo jiboe koiare cere cedo nono matadureboe reore , tagirema taerduwa rakaguragare . Cegi ceragakare , tagirema taragare . Tagire boe eerdu kurire tai , cegirema boere cewarigodydo cei . Jii oino cemagudure cege boi kai , marenarure cegi , boe erorerure cei , cemuga kidagodyrewy bokwa . Jii oino cemedugodyre cemaragodyi cegera tabo dytabo . Boe enogwaguru pegare cedabo dykeje , cenogwaguru pemegare boe ebo , boe etonare cei dykeje , cere cegiwa rakado ; boe emago pegai cei dykeje , cenogituwa pemegado boei . Jii oino cere nono awy moto kejewy boe gigudu reore , boe eiamedu boere cebijido . Ire bapera atugodo awy inodu jamedu boeji , mare iwo tabogurudo du bogai karega , mare iwo taerduwado nono imeardu kurire jiwu itoreie ure tagi dyji . Paga karega , umode taerduwadowyge emagaguragamode Cristo tada , mare taomage emagaguragakare ; igoiare ire itoredo tagi Cristo tada , bakaru pemegarewy koia .
